text: Analysing Marks The student response has the following characteristics: « the identification of sufficient and relevant evidence 4-5 « thorough identification of relevant trends/patterns/relationships in evidence « thorough and appropriate identification of limitations of evidence « the identification of relevant evidence 2-3 « identification of obvious trends/patterns/relationships in evidence « basic identification of limitations of evidence « the identification of insufficient and irrelevant evidence 1 « identification of incorrect or irrelevant trends/patterns/relationships in evidence « incorrect or insufficient identification of limitations of evidence. The student response does not match any of the descriptors above. _
